title: Le Quattrocento
description: Episode 14 of Series “Il Etait Une Fois L'homme” (= “Once Upon a Time Man”). The Quattrocento was a period of prosperity and steady progression in the arts  toward the harmonious balance achieved in the High Renaissance. In concrete terms, the Quattrocento is regarded  as beginning in 1401 with a competition to design the eastern doors for the Baptistery in Florence and ending in 1503  with the election of Cardinal Giuliano della Rovere as Pope Julius II. Reference: Encyclopedia Britannica.  Credits: Director, writer, Albert Barille ; photography, Jean-Louis Karcher ; art direction, Philippe Landrot, Rene Borg ; graphic research, Jean Barbaud. Cast: Roger Carel, Francine Laine, Pierre Trabaud, Henri Djanik [original French narration].
